e-editiones
About Semantic Web Technology Ontologies

Text Expression

Formal description of text expression, based on FRBROO, in broadest sense, with general subclasses, related classes, and properties.
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text expression, based on FRBROO, in broadest sense, with general subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Text, text structure, prosodic structure, note structure, text editing, and scientific editing are described in respective ontologies
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about text expression
article
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text expression about a defined main subject.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
individual text expression
text author
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person being responsible for the creation of a text expression.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
skos:note
Often an author is also the creator of a text expression.
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ creating#Author
biography
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text expression about a person's life.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
individual text expression
text body
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Main section of a text expression, e.g. including footnotes and illustrations but excluding the front matter and back matter.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:label
text body
,
Texthauptteil
,
corps du texte
and
corpo del testo
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#CompositionalContentStructure
and
text expression part
co-author
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person being co-responsible for the creation of a text expression.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
text author
commentary
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text expression in the form of a set of comments as analysis, interpretation or explanation of something.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:label
commentary
,
Kommentar
,
commento
and
commentaire
rdfs:subClassOf
text expression

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ human#PersonRole

a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
individual text expression
diary entry
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Periodical, usually daily description of a personal experience or observation written in a diary.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#CompositionalContentStructure
and
text expression
dictionary
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
List of brief explanatory entries for terms of a human natural language, belonging to a certain domain, providing their meaning, mostly ordered, e.g. alphabetically.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
individual text expression
text expression draft
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Document draft as text expression.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
text expression
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#Draft

rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#Text

rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Part of an individual text expression, considered as incomplete.

http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#ExpressionPart
and
text expression

rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

,

,

and

individual text expression
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text as individual expression.

http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
text expression
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#IndividualExpression
text introduction
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Beginning section of a text expression, usually written by the (main) author, stating e.g. the subject, purpose and limits of its main section; usually remaining unchanged.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.abc-clio.com/ ODLIS/ odlis f.aspx
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#CompositionalContentStructure
and
text expression part

rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment

,

,

and

rdfs:subClassOf
scientific expression
text vulgarizer
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Role of a person vulgarizing a text expression, e.g. a scientific one, or creating one using vulgarizing terminology.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ human#Vulgarizer

text expression has author
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text expression to a person who authored it.
rdfs:domain
text expression
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-expression#
rdfs:label
text expression has author
,
l'espressione di testo ha autore
,
l'expression de texte a auteur
and
Textexpression hat Autor
skos:note
A text can have more than one author.
rdfs:range
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ human#Person
and
owl:Restriction
owl:onProperty
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ human#personHasRole
owl:someValuesFrom
text author
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ creating#hasAuthor

owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment
